thread.title: This Huge, Gorgeous Dutch Oven Is Only $86 Today — Amazon Kitchen Deal of the Day
thread.title_full: This Huge, Gorgeous Dutch Oven Is Only $86 Today — Amazon Kitchen Deal of the Day

author: Faith Durand
title: This Huge, Gorgeous Dutch Oven Is Only $86 Today — Amazon Kitchen Deal of the Day
text:
Share (Image credit: Lodge) 
It's been a while since I was in the mode of looking for a new Dutch oven (there are only so many that one can stash in one's cupboards!) but this creamy white model from Lodge is making me feel a little lustful. So big! So lovely! Oval and luxe — and so affordable! (Image credit: Lodge) 
Amazon's deals don't always tempt me but this one is rather great. Do you have a Lodge Dutch oven? Do you like it? Tell us all about it! Buy It
